fields.name: Flower of Eden (C1)
fields.value: Transient Blossoms generated by Albedo's Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma regenerate 1.2 Energy for Albedo.

fields.name: Opening of Phanerozoic (C2)
fields.value:
Transient Blossoms generated by Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma grant Albedo Fatal Reckoning for 30s:
> Unleashing Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide consumes all stacks of Fatal Reckoning. Each stack of Fatal Reckoning consumed increases the DMG dealt by Fatal Blossoms and Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide's burst DMG by 30% of Albedo's DEF.
This effect stacks up to 4 times.

fields.name: Grace of Helios (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Descent of Divinity (C4)
fields.value: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field have their Plunging Attack DMG increased by 30%.

fields.name: Tide of Hadaen (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the level of Rite of Progeniture: Tectonic Tide by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Dust of Purification (C6)
fields.value: Active party members within the Solar Isotoma field who are protected by a shield created by Crystallize have their DMG increased by 17%.
